channel.title: Not again
channel.description:
No! Not again..
"From today onwards, newly created free to play accounts will be subject to a number of trade limitations, consisting of:
[ul][li]New free-to-play accounts can only give away gold coins or items, or make a trade with an imbalance in the recipient’s favour, to the value of 25000 coins per 24 hours. This limitation also applies to drop trades. [/li] [li]New free-to-play accounts can make Duel Arena bets with no greater imbalance than 25000 coins per 24 hours.[/li] [li]We have also made a change to Wilderness PvP, where noted items will only appear to the original carrier when dropped upon death; not the killer. This affects all accounts – not just ones subject to the limitations above.[/li][/ul]
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/anti-gold-farming-measures

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I thought the limitation would leave if you after exact level like 30+, but after reading the whole thing…

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @I_like_rods4 I like rods4
item.description:
@I_like_rods4 wrote:

“The limitations will remain in effect until the affected account purchases membership. Subscribing will remove these restrictions permanently, even if the subscription later ends and is not renewed.”

-Mark Gerhard
CEO & CTO Read more before you post.

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:30, topic:422537”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=525208.msg3823445#msg3823445 date=1321981071]
Well it will help stop gold farmers for now. But does seem a bit unfair for most players, such as skillers who want to transfer their stuff.
[/quote]

This is against the rules of runescape anyway

[quote=Jagex]Multiple logging-in

You are free to create more than one account, but if you do, you must not log into more than one at any time, and the accounts must not interact with each other in any way.[/quote][/quote]
You do realize this is a RuneScape Emulation site right? We break rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

tinyscape:

Well it will help stop gold farmers for now. But does seem a bit unfair for most players, such as skillers who want to transfer their stuff.

This is against the rules of runescape anyway

[b]Multiple logging-in[/b]

You are free to create more than one account, but if you do, you must not log into more than one at any time, and the accounts must not interact with each other in any way.

Read full topic

This is a very good thing.

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:27, topic:422537"]I just made a new account and someone asked if I’m rich, I said my main has 1m cash and he just traded me and gave me 10M. Not the first time this week either. Someone gave me like 300k earlier, Jagex is truly making people mad.

This antigold farming thing is pretty cool actually, but I’m sure they will get around it once again, selling rares which shop price is like 1gp and market price 10m+.[/quote]
If you do sell a rare to a store other players can’t see it, same goes for any item.

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I just made a new account and someone asked if I’m rich, I said my main has 1m cash and he just traded me and gave me 10M. Not the first time this week either. Someone gave me like 300k earlier, Jagex is truly making people mad.

This antigold farming thing is pretty cool actually, but I’m sure they will get around it once again, selling rares which shop price is like 1gp and market price 10m+.

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I don’t see what the big deal is, unless you are a level 3 who just found 600m and want to put it on your main this wont affect you.

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

vManlyMan:

So noted items aren’t dropped in PvP anymore? What does that help with?

It will help slow down and make life hard for real life traders, for example someone wouldn’t be able to bring 1k dragon bones into the wildy, the would have to bring 28 at a time, which is a big inconvenience.

Read full topic

item.title: Not again
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:422537”][quote author=Native^ link=topic=525208.msg3823437#msg3823437 date=1321980708]
But don’t you think this will be unfair for new player?
[/quote]I think it would be nice for them, they will learn to get there own stuff instead of going “FREE STOFF PL0X”[/quote]

They will still beg, they are allowed to take an unlimited amount from higher level players, they just can’t give out more then 25k

What’s more, there is no limit to the value of gifts that can be received by a new free-to-play account, so there’s nothing to stop a new player from receiving a helping hand from a high-levelled friend. Needless to say, balanced trades between players are not a problem, either.

Read full topic
